REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0009 reute h f BC-BENIHANA-<BNHN>-TO-BU 03-11 0072

TEXT.TITLE: BENIHANA <BNHN> TO BUILD RESTAURANT IN FLORIDA
TEXT.BODY: Benihana National Corp said it signed a letter of intent with <Tishman Realty and Construction Co Inc> to build a teppanyaki-style restaurant at the Hilton Hotel at Walt Disney World Village in Lake Buena Vista, Fal. Benihana National said it currently owns and operates 16 teppanyaki-style restaurants under license from its parent, <Benihana of Tokyo Inc>. Reuter
